channel.title: Menus on The Radnor Arms
channel.description: Recent content in Menus on The Radnor Arms

item.title: All-Day
item.description: All-Day Menu Please note that all items are based on availability and may change at a moments notice. Thank you for your understanding. Appetisers Homemade Soup(s) - Starter: £6 / Main: £8 Served with rustic bread and butter. Check for todays’ choice(s). Breaded Garlic Mushrooms (V) - £6 Served with salad garnish and homemade garlic dip. Battered Calamari - £6 Served with a salad garnish and homemade garlic mayonnaise. Halloumi Fries (V) - £6 Served with a salad garnish and sweet chilli dips.

item.title: Light Lunch
item.description: Baps & Jackets Please note that all items are based on availability and may change at a moments notice. Thank you for your understanding. Light Lunch Jacket Potato £8 Choice of Tuna Mayo, Cheese & Coleslaw, Bacon & Cheese or Baked Beans & Cheese Hot Sausage Roll & Salad £7 All Baps served with a garnish of fries & Salad Soft Floured Baps £8 Choice of Bacon, Bacon & Sausage, Bacon & Cheese (Cheddar or Brie), grated Cheese & Mayo or Cheese & Coleslaw

item.title: Sunday Menu
item.description: Sunday Menu Please note that all items are based on availability and may change at a moments notice. Thank you for your understanding. Appetisers Homemade Soup - Starter: £6 / Main: £8 Served with rustic bread and butter. Please ask at the bar for the choice(s). Breaded Garlic Mushrooms (V) - £6 Served with a salad garnish and garlic mayonnaise. Halloumi Fries (V) - £6 Served with a salad garnish and garlic mayonnaise.
